structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Evidence required of ad valorem tax payment.
law.text: The county clerk shall not transfer the registration on any motor vehicle or trailer against which a tax lien has been filed until the taxes have been paid and the lien has been released.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 371, sec. 4, effective January 1, 1981.
